alert.note: Alert for Marengo; Sumter (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 10:58AM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Marengo and south central Sumter Counties through 1145 AM CDT... At 1058 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Myrtlewood, or 13 miles west of Linden, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Linden, Jefferson, Myrtlewood, Freddie Jones Field, Pin Hook, Chickasaw State Park, Calvary, Half Acre, Whitfield, Old Spring Hill and Octagon. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
